section.title: Changing Default Jobs
section.para: The procedure to make changes to jobs created by default in &kw-hos; is to edit the model file, my_cloud/config/freezer/jobs.yml and then re-run the _freezer-manage-jobs.yml playbook. (Note that the backup/restore component is called "Freezer" so you may see commands by that name.)

step.para: Open jobs.yml in an editor, then change and save the file:
Commit the file to the local git repository:
step.screen: git add -A git commit -m "Backup job changes"

step.para: Next, run the configuration processor followed by the ready-deployment playbooks:
step.screen: cd ~/openstack/ardana/ansible/ ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml
